name: mkdir
desc: The mkdir command can create a new directory

-m.name: Set the permission of the new directory

content:
Example

  • Create a directory named mydir:
    mkdir mydir
  • Create a directory named yourdir and set the directory permissions to 755:
    mkdir -m 755 yourdir
  • Recursively create a directory named mydir/yourdir:
    mkdir -p mydir/yourdir
